title: Understanding the Business Model Canvas (BMC) Through Visual Metaphors

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic business operations and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical course concretizing abstract BMC concepts through visual metaphors (VM) in smartphone-centered limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the nine components of the Business Model Canvas (BMC) by connecting them to visual metaphors.
Learners can apply the BMC while analyzing business scenarios in simulation/VR environments.
Learners can create BMC-based value proposition documents through individual/team project deliverables.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
